title: Heat Ray
info: The Heat Ray is a Hardmode, post-Golem magic weapon that has a 1/8 (12.5%) on Console and 3DS or 1/7 (14.29%) on Desktop and Mobile chance to be dropped by Golem. It auto-fires beams which provide significant illumination and instantaneously strike their targets.
